articles.description: Amy Grant suffered a concussion and was unconscious for ten minutes after falling during a July bike ride, according to reports. The singer announced Friday that her remaining tour dates for the summer and early fall would be postponed as a consequence. Initi…
articles.content:
Amy Grant suffered a concussion and was unconscious for ten minutes after falling during a July bike ride, according to reports.

articles.title: 5 classic South Park episodes that speak to our current moment - The A.V. Club
articles.description: As the show marks its 25th anniversary, here are some prime examples of why Trey Parker and Matt Stone’s series remains as relevant as ever
articles.content: South Park has taken on racism frequently in its long run, memorably dropping the n-word 42 times in one episode (With Apologies To Jesse Jackson) to make a point about cancel culture and performativ… [+1988 chars]
